description: This file defines API endpoints for managing job applications, including listing and adding jobs, using FastAPI. It includes in-memory storage fallback and database interaction with SQLite.

classes.name: JobCreate
classes.description: Pydantic model for creating a new job, with validation rules.

methods.name: _add_job
methods.description: Adds a job record to the database or in-memory store depending on configuration.

methods.name: _list_jobs
methods.description: Retrieves list of jobs for a user from database or in-memory store.

methods.name: list_my_jobs
methods.description: API endpoint to list current user's job applications.

methods.name: add_job
methods.description: API endpoint to add a new job application for current user.
